altername_name: Professor Layton e la Maschera dei Miracoli, Il
Professor Layton en het Masker der Wonderen
Professor Layton und die Maske der Wunder
Professeur Layton et le Masque des Miracles
El Profesor Layton y la Máscara de los Prodigios
Layton Kyouju to Kiseki no Kamen
name: Professor Layton and the Miracle Mask
overview: Professor Layton's first adventure on the Nintendo 3DS system takes him to the colorful city of Monte d'Or, where he must stop a mysterious man from wreaking havoc with the powerful Mask of Chaos. Unravel new details about Professor Layton's past alongside Luke, assistant Emmy Altava, and a whole new cast of characters in this riveting story. Wrack your brain with hundreds of puzzles weaving their way throughout the story. In addition, download free daily puzzles for a year! With a robust hint system to help players of all experience levels, and an epic tale packed to the brim with all-new puzzles, Professor Layton makes his triumphant return-only for Nintendo 3DS.
